tickets.outOfTickets: All these tickets are currently reserved, but you can enter the waiting list and we will let you know if a spot opens up!
tickets.name: Name

contact.ituk: Student Council of School of IT of TTU

1.q: How can I pay for my ticket?
1.a: After reserving the ticket, an email will be sent to you with all the necessary information. The ticket has to be payed for in 3 workdays. Team captain will pay for the whole team.

2.a: Your spot will be reserved right after making your reservation. To keep your spot, the transfer to the bank account in the email has to be made in 3 workdays.

3.q: What can I do with a spectator ticket?
3.a: The spectator ticket will grant you access to the hall and entertainment that doesn't require your own PC.

4.q: What do I have to bring?
4.a: Your PC with all the necessary gear (monitor, mouse, keyboard, etc.) and an extension cord.

5.q: What will be provided at the location?
5.a: Deskspace, a chair, a network cable and one power socket. BRING YOUR OWN EXTENSION CORD!

6.q: Can I sleep at the location during the event?
6.a: Yes, you can sleep in designated TTÜ rooms. Bring a matt and a sleeping bag.

7.q: I don't have a team, can I join alone?
7.a: You can get a regular gamer ticket. It only prevents you from participating in the CS:GO tournament.

8.a: Yes, but everyone younger than 16 have to fill

buy.name: Name
buy.info: Pilet broneeritakse pärast "Osta pilet" vajutamist. Pärast seda kuvatakse ning saadetakse emailile arve, mis tuleb tasuda 3 päeva jooksul. Pilet loetakse tasutuks kui raha on kandunud arves viidatud kontole. Pileti eest tasumise staatust on hiljem võimalik kontrollida sisse logides või kasutades emailis sisalduvat linki. Samuti saadetakse pileti kinnitamisel email.
buy.sentToMail: The invoice has been sent to your e-mail
buy.vatInfo: MTÜ FOR Tsükkel is not eligible for VAT under the Estonian Value-Added Tax Act and the fee does not include VAT.
buy.paymentInfo: To confirm the ticket the payment must be received by the receiver in 3 days after receiving the invoice at the latest. Unpaid tickets will be discarded.
buy.checkMail: The invoice has been sent to your e-mail
